messages.message: I wanted to write a launch social post of chatbots with a fun relatable use case. As a football fan, I thought being able to query details about Arsenal's 23-24 (heartbreaking) season would be interesting. While testing it out, found that we really struggle with complex analytical questions, sharing some instances in the :thread:. As we move towards SOI, it'll be great to improve in this aspects to truly be a powerful assistant v/s mainly lookup tasks. We aren't far with things like TDF, etc :muscle::skin-tone-4:
It does really well on lookup questions :fire:
But struggles to compute data to answer questions :disappointed:
On info lookup it does decently but fails to return good formatting as requested consistently
Is able to cross reference well across 2 files! But for the 3rd match, fails to get the goalkeeper from David Raya's stats excel
BTW there was another scenario I wanted to do but avoided since we don't support graph/infographic input - stanford AI report
